data.outputDescription: Triangle of alphabets of n lines separated by spaces

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

Print triangle of alphabets of n lines
Input
A single integer n
Output
Triangle of alphabets of n lines separated by spaces
Constraints
1<=n<=25
Example
Input
5
Output
    A
   B C
  D E F
 G H I J
K L M N O
